QuestData.Title: Pei-Back
QuestData.Description: <Ancestral spirits stream into the tan-chao, Pei-Zhi's bridge to freedom.$B$BOne final chamber lingers in the ruins, just north of the tan-chao. The air above crackles with foul energy. Shan Jitong is already at work.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Confront Shan Jitong and rescue Pei-Zhi at the Seat of the Spirit Waker in the Terrace of Ten Thunders.
QuestData.RewardText: This age must be one of great strife to breed heroes such as you. I can only imagine what adventures must lie ahead.$B$BIt has been my great honor to have met you, $p.$B$BI will remain here to usher out the last of the spirits before crossing the tan-chao myself.$B$BStill, I am disturbed by the spirit waker's dying curse...$B$B"You will not stop the thunder."$B$BWhat could he have meant?
